panels.title: App Version
panels.description: app version with commit and branch links

panels.title: Components Health Avg by Service over 15m
panels.description: Only displays services with health average < 90%

panels.title: TX Manager Gas Bump Exceeds Limit
TX Manager Time Until broadcast
panels.description: The amount of time elapsed from when a transaction is enqueued to until it is broadcast

panels.title: TX Manager Time Until confirmed
panels.description: The amount of time elapsed from a transaction being broadcast to being included in a block

targets.expr: sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_calls_success{instance=~"${instance}", }[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName) / sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_calls_total{instance=~"${instance}", }[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName)

panels.title: EVM Pool RPC Node Calls Success Rate

targets.expr: sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_dials_failed{instance=~"${instance}", }[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName) / sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_calls_total{instance=~"${instance}", }[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName)

panels.title: EVM Pool RPC Node Dials Failure Rate

targets.expr: sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_verifies_success{instance=~"${instance}", }[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName) / sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_verifies{instance=~"${instance}", }[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName) * 100

panels.title: EVM Pool RPC Node Verifies Success Rate

targets.expr: sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_verifies_failed{instance=~"${instance}", }[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName) / sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_verifies{instance=~"${instance}", }[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName) * 100
